analyzed: ārya abuddha bala ādhāna prātihārya vikurvaṇa nirdeśa nāma
mahāyāna sūtram

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadīnairañjanātīre sanniṣannāḥ sārdhamāryāvalokiteśvara vajrapāṇi maitreyamajuśrīpūrvaṅgamaiḥ saptabodhisattvasahasraiḥ  #
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadī nairañjanā tīre sanniṣannāḥ sārdham ārya avalokiteśvara vajrapāṇi maitreyam ajuśrī pūrvaṅgamaiḥ sapta bodhisattva sahasraiḥ  /

original: sārdhaṃ subhūti śāriputramaudgalyāyana–purvaṅgamaiḥ sarvermahāśrāvakaiḥ śakrabrahmalokapālarājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sarvaiḥ satkṛtaḥ mānitaḥ  #
analyzed: sārdham subhūti śāriputra maudgalyāyana purvaṅgamaiḥ sarveḥ mahāśrāvakaiḥ śakra brahma lokapāla rāja amātya brāhmaṇa gṛhapatibhiḥ sarvaiḥ satkṛtaḥ mānitaḥ

original: bhagavān bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalamālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇo dharmapratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati saṃcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati
analyzed: bhagavān bhakta kṛtyam kṛtvā maṇḍala mālāyām saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ dharma pratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati saṃcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati

original: maṇḍalamālāyastathāgato maharddhinagarīṃ vārāṇasīṃ gatvā tasyāmāmrapālīvane niṣidati sma |
analyzed: maṇḍalamālāyaḥ tathāgataḥ mahā ṛddhi nagarīm vārāṇasīm gatvā tasyām āmrapālī vane niṣidati sma

original: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivī saṃkampitā saṃpravedhitā |
analyzed: atha tasmin samaye mahā pṛthivī saṃkampitā saṃpravedhitā

original: sthitaṃ tatra mahāsiṃhāsanamekaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ saptakarmakṛtaṃ yojanamātramuccamardhayojanamātravistṛtaṃ sukhacitamatiharṣaṇīyaṃ manojñaṃ  #
analyzed: sthitam tatra mahā siṃhāsanam ekam nānā ratna mayam sapta karma kṛtam yojana mātram uccam ardha yojana mātra vistṛtam sukha citam ati harṣaṇīyam manojñam
divya bhakta saṃstṛtam nānā divya puṣpa phala pralambitam divya gandha varṇa yuktam
tathāgatānām avaropita kuśala mūlam avalokya sarva sattvānām anutpatti dharma kṣānti pratilambhaḥ bhūt

original: atha bhagavān siṃhāsanasthito buddhāvataṃsakanāma samādhiṃ pratilebhe |
analyzed: atha bhagavān siṃhāsana sthitaḥ buddha avataṃsaka nāma samādhim pratilebhe
atha samādheḥ vyutthāya bodhisattva ārya avalokiteśvaram vajrapāṇim ca idam avocat

original: avalokiteśvara tvaṃ mahālokadhātuṃ gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineyasattvānāṃ kaṣāyayuktānām aśrāddhānāṃ pāpacaritānāṃ kleśāvṛtanām amātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānāma  #
analyzed: avalokiteśvara tvam mahā lokadhātum gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineya sattvānām kaṣāya yuktānām aśrāddhānām pāpa caritānām kleśa āvṛtanām a mātṛ jñānām a pitṛ jñānām a

original: aśrāmaṇyānām abrāhmaṇyānāṃ triratnānabhiśrāddhānāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ ca vajrapāṇiśca dvau maharddhiṃ samādhibalaṃ prapadya asyāṃ maṇḍalamālāyāmabhisaṃkṣipya  #
analyzed: a śrāmaṇyānām a brāhmaṇyānām triratna an abhiśrāddhānām teṣām sarveṣām tvam ca vajrapāṇiḥ ca dvau mahā ṛddhim samādhi balam prapadya asyām maṇḍala mālāyām abhisaṃkṣipya
saṃgraham kurutam

original: athāryāvalokiteśvaro vajrapāṇiśca tathāgatasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānvalokya samuttejanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede |
analyzed: atha ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ ca tathāgatasya vacanam śrutvā sarva sattva anvalokya samuttejanam nāma samādhim samāpede

original: tena samādhibalena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā |
analyzed: tena samādhi balena mahā pṛthivī ṣaṣ vikāram kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā

original: trisāhasamahāsāhasralokadhātau brahmalokadhātau yāvad rūpalokadhātau tayoḥ kāyāvabhāsaprādurbhāvo'bhūt |
analyzed: trisāhasa mahā sāhasra lokadhātau brahma lokadhātau yāvat rūpa lokadhātau tayoḥ

original: atha tadavabhāsat imāḥ saṃcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma |
analyzed: atha tat avabhāsat imāḥ saṃcodanāḥ gāthāḥ niścaranti sma

original: atha tadā kāyāvabhāsāniścaritagāthāvasāne ekaikaṃ pāramparyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvā vijñāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ |
analyzed: atha tadā kāya avabhāsa aniścarita gāthā avasāne ekaikam pāramparyeṇa tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvāḥ vijñāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ

original: te sarve sattvā mithyādṛsṭiṃ parityajya samyagadṛṣṭiyuktā abhūvan |
analyzed: te sarve sattvāḥ mithyā dṛsṭim parityajya samyak adṛṣṭi yuktāḥ abhūvan
ye māna mada stambha yuktāḥ te māna mada stambha viyuktāḥ abhūvan

original: ye kāmarāgānucaritāḥ pramattāste prāṇātipādattādānakāmeṣu–mithyācārādyaṣṭākuśaladharmebhyo nivṛttāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge sthāpitāḥ |
analyzed: ye kāma rāga anucaritāḥ pramattāḥ te prāṇa atipādatta ādāna kāma iṣu mithyā ācāra ādi aṣṭa akuśala dharmebhyaḥ nivṛttāḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgika mārge sthāpitāḥ
sarve te auddhatya hāsya lāsya krīḍā lobha krodha īrṣyā rāga ādi sarvam parityajya tathāgata darśana sevana paryupāsana dharma śravaṇa kāmāḥ abhūvan
deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura kinnara garuḍa mahoraga rāja amātya bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikābhiḥ sarve divya puṣpa mālya gandha cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā ādibhiḥ
tathā atas pūjitaḥ

original: atha sarve te yena mahānagaryayāṃ vārāṇasyām āmrapālīvanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatānāmavaropitakuśalamūlapuṇyatejasā tathāgatasyopari puṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣan
analyzed: atha sarve te yena mahā nagaryayām vārāṇasyām āmrapālī vanam tena upasaṃkramya tathāgatānām avaropita kuśala mūla puṇya tejasā tathāgatasya upari puṣpa varṣam abhiprāvarṣan

original: [athā tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālīvanaṃ samantataḥ niyutaśatasahastrayojana] vistīrṇamadhyatiṣṭhat samaṃ pāṇitalamiva ca divyaṃ manoramaṃ  #
analyzed: athā tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālī vanam samantataḥ niyuta śata sahastra yojana vistīrṇam adhyatiṣṭhat samam pāṇi talam iva ca divyam manoramam
varṇa upetam
divya puṣpa vṛkṣa gandha vṛkṣa phala vṛkṣa mahāratna vṛkṣa kalpavṛkṣa vastra vṛkṣa ādibhiḥ alaṅkṛtam divya saṃhāsana upetam ratna patta dāma abhiprabham pītam
divya kiṅkiṇī dāma śabda upaśobhitam tat yathā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ
tathā manojñam pralhādanīyam premaṇīyam abhinandanīyam sarva bodhisattva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoragaḥ
pāsaka upāsikā rāja amātya brāhmaṇa gṛhapati ākīrṇam adhyatiṣṭhat

original: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiśca samādhervyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
analyzed: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ vajrapāṇiḥ ca samādheḥ vyutthāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantam etat avocat
asti bhagavan tathāgatānām upāya kauśalyam sattva paripākāya
bahavaḥ bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ mahāśrāvakāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga rāja amātya gṛhapatayaḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ
saṃnipatitāḥ tathāgata tejasā ṛddhi anubhāvena
sādhu sādhu kula putrāḥ

original: e]vameva bahavo bho jinaputrāstathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ sattvaparipākāya yathāśayānāṃ [yathā vainayikakuśalamūlādhigatānāṃ] nānādhimuktānāṃ  #
analyzed: evam eva bahavaḥ bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānām upāya kauśalyam sattva paripākāya yathā āśayānām yathā vainayika kuśala mūla adhigatānām nānā adhimuktānām
sattvānām carim jñātvā dharmam deśayanti

original: kecit sattvā bodhisattvavaineyāḥ kecicchrāvaka[vaineyāḥ kecit pratyekabuddhavaineyāḥ kecid devavaineyāḥ kecit śakra]vaineyāḥ kecid brahmavaineyāḥ  #
analyzed: kecid sattvāḥ bodhisattva vaineyāḥ kecid śrāvaka vaineyāḥ kecid pratyekabuddha vaineyāḥ kecid deva vaineyāḥ kecid śakra vaineyāḥ kecid brahma vaineyāḥ

original: kecinnāgavaineyāḥ kecinmahardhikavaineyāḥ kecidrājavaineyāḥ kecit [samādhivaineyāḥ kecid dharmaśravaṇa]vaineyāḥ kecit prātihāryavaineyāḥ kecittathāgataparinirvāṇavaineyāḥ  #
analyzed: kecid nāga vaineyāḥ kecid mahardhika vaineyāḥ kecid rāja vaineyāḥ kecid samādhi vaineyāḥ kecid dharma śravaṇa vaineyāḥ kecid prātihārya vaineyāḥ kecid tathāgata parinirvāṇa vaineyāḥ

kecid dhātu vaineyāḥ kecid caitya karaṇa praveśa vihāra caṃkrama udyāna kārāpaṇa kuśala mūla vaineya utsukāḥ kecid prastara pratibimba kārāpaṇa ālekhya suvarṇa rajata raitya pratibimba kārāpaṇa kuśala mūla utasuka vaineyāḥ
kecid bhikṣu saṃgha pūjana satkaraṇa kuśala mūla utsuka vaineyāḥ kecid sūtra pṛcchana likhana pathana pūjana ut suka vaineyāḥ kecid dīpa puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya āhāra abhyalaṃkaraṇa utsukāḥ
bhavanti

original: tadyathā] bho jinaputrā vaidyaḥ suśikṣitaḥ sarvāṣṭāṅgāyurvedamupagataḥ sarvadhātukauśalyasarvadravyopakaraṇaprayogābhiyuktaḥ [sattvānāṃ nānā]vyādhiśarīraparipīḍitānām  #

original: vātikaṃ paittikaṃ ślaiṣmikaṃ sānnipātikaṃ rudhiram āmajaṃ gulmikaṃ jalodaraṃ [hṛdrogaṃ] kuṣṭhaṃ [kaṇḍūṃ dadruṃ] piṭakādīn viṣa][vaisarpā]dīn  #
analyzed: vātikam paittikam ślaiṣmikam sānnipātikam rudhiram āma jam gulmikam jalodaram hṛd rogam kuṣṭham kaṇḍūm dadrum piṭaka ādīn viṣa vaisarpa ādīn
jānāti

original: sa sarvaṃ jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravyauṣadhāni [prayojya vamana]virecanacūrṇayoganastukarma–sīrābaṃdhana–ghṛtataila–bālacūrṇayogena pācana–vamana–prayogopāyaiḥ  #
analyzed: sa sarvam jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravya auṣadhāni prayojya vamana virecana cūrṇa yoga nastu karma sīrābaṃdhana ghṛta taila bāla cūrṇa yogena pācana vamana prayoga upāyaiḥ
sarva sattvānām tān sava vyādhin upaśamayati
nānā vyādhitaḥ parimokṣyante nānā vyādhi bhayebhyaḥ ca
evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ nānā samādhi ṛddhipāda bala vaiśāradya divya cakṣuḥ śrotra ādibhiḥ aṣṭāṅga āyurveda samanvāgataḥ nānā dhātu āśaya prayoga kuśalaḥ  /
rāga dveṣa moha sattvānām māna mada matta tā vṛtānām kāma śoka bhaya krodha āvṛtānām naraka tiryagyoni yama loka bhūmi parimokṣaṇa arham
nānā upāya kauśalyaiḥ nānā prakāra yogaiḥ nānā samādhi ṛddhi vikrīḍitaiḥ sattvān parimocayati
yāvat anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa ādhātau parinirvā āopayati
akuśalaiḥ dhamaiḥ parimokṣyate
ārya aṣṭāṅge mārge pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: tadyathāpi kulaputrāḥ candramaṇḍalamupāyākauśalya [samanvāgataṃ yathā]dhātukuśalamūlavaineyān sattvānāmarthāya ātmānamantarhitaṃ darśayati
analyzed: tat yathā api kula putrāḥ candra maṇḍalam upāya a kauśalya samanvāgatam yathā dhātu kuśala mūla vaineyān sattvānām arthāya ātmānam antarhitam darśayati
ardhacandra ākṛti maṇḍalam upadarśayati
kṛṣṇāpakṣa śuklapakṣāṇi upadarśayati
paripūrṇa candra maṇḍalam upadarśayati
sarva tamaḥ undhakāram vidhamayati
sarva tṛṇa vana gulma oṣadhi phala ādīn pralhādayati

original: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ nānāduḥkhāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgacaryākauśalyaṃ parinirvānāṃ darsayati |
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānām nānā duḥkha āvṛtānām sattvānām nānā dhātu vaineyānām sattvānām mārga caryā kauśalyam parinirvānām darsayati
jātim darśayati
cakravarti rājyam darśayati
krīḍā rati strī hāsya lāsya gandha mālya rati kriḍām darśayati
gṛha tyāga pravrajyā duṣkara caryām darśayati
māra bala damana dharma cakra pravartanam darśayati
yāvat mahā dharma megha vṛṣṭayā sarva sattvānām saṃtoṣaṇam upadarśayati
parinirvṛtāḥ api tathāgatāḥ nānā prayoga dhātu pūjana stūpa vihāra pritibiṃba ākāra āpaṇa pravrajyā abhiniṣkramaṇa bhikṣu saṃgha satkāra vinaya dharma likhana vācana paṭhanāt eva
sarva sattvān mokṣayanti
śikṣā dhāraṇā vrata niyama upavāsa saṃvara grahaṇa upāya kuśalaiḥ sarva sattvān mokṣayanti
sarva naraka tiryagyoni yama loka akṣaṇa apāya durgatibhyaḥ yāvat pralhādayanti
dharma śravaṇena anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbaudhau sthāpayanti

original: atha tasmin samaye keṣāṃcidalpabuddhīnāṃ devaputrāṇām etadabhavat |
analyzed: atha tasmin samaye keṣāṃcid alpabuddhīnām deva putrāṇām etat abhavat

original: kimayaṃ tathāgataḥ kṣiprameva parinīrvāṇadhātau [praveṣṭumicchatīti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan |
analyzed: kim ayam tathāgataḥ kṣipram eva parinīrvāṇa dhātau praveṣṭum icchati iti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan
parinirvāṇām varṇayati sūcayati
mahā parṣad saṃnipātya nānā ṛddhi vikurvāṇa prātihāryam darśayati

original: [tadyathā pūrvakaiḥ] tathāġatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaistathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ dīrghataramāyuradhiṣṭhāya sarvasattvān jātijarāvyādhi–[cyutiśoka]–paridevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: tat yathā pūrvakaiḥ tathāataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ tathāgata kṛtyam kṛtam dīrghataram āyuḥ adhiṣṭhāya sarva sattvān jāti jarā vyādhi cyuti śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsebhyaḥ  /

original: parimokṣya tathāyamanena tathāgatena sarve tathāgatakṛtyaṃ nādyapi kṛtam |
analyzed: parimokṣya tathā ayam anena tathāgatena sarve tathāgata kṛtyam na ādi api kṛtam
tasmāt śoka vyatikramaṇam saṃvarṇayati itim cintayitvā te tūṣṇīm abhūvan

original: atha majuṣrīḥ kumārabhūtasteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva citta mājñāya tān devaputrānetadavocat |
analyzed: atha majuṣrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ teṣām deva putrāṇām cetasā eva citta mā ājñāya tān deva putrān etat avocat
deva putrāḥ mā evam cintayata mā pravyāharat
mā dina manasaḥ bhavat
bahūni tathāgatānām upāya kuśala nānā upāya prajñā samādhi ādi kuśala mūla bala praṇidhānāni nānā āśayānām sattvānām dharmam deśayanti

original: yathā mayā devaputrāḥ tathāġatānāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgato[pāyakauśalyam ṛddhivi]kurvāṇa prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāhaṃ jānāmi |
analyzed: yathā mayā deva putrāḥ tathāatānām pūrvakāṇām tathāgata upāya kauśalyam ṛddhi vikurvāṇa prātihāryam dṛṣṭam tathā aham jānāmi

original: mā hi eva tathāgato buddhabalādhānaprātihāryaṃ nāma mahāsūtrarājaṃ pra[kāśayitukāmo'ti]reka kartukāmaḥ |
analyzed: mā hi eva tathāgataḥ buddha bala ādhāna prātihāryam nāma mahā sūtra rājam prakāśayitu kāmaḥ utireka kartu kāmaḥ

original: api ca devaputrā na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti |
analyzed: api ca deva putrāḥ na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti
na tathāgatānām parinirvāṇam saṃvidyate
na āyuḥ kṣayaḥ bhavati
aprameya kalpa koṭim an abhilāpya a kalpāḥ tathāgatāḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: api ca upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ dharśayanti |
analyzed: api ca upāya kauśalyena sattvānām parinirvāṇam dharśayanti
na ca ākrāntiḥ na saṃkrāṇtiḥ tathāgatānām saṃvidyate
saddharma antardhānam darśayanti

original: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇavaineyaḥ dhātuvaineyaḥ kaśāyika[jātīyaḥ tathāga]te aśraddadhānatām aguruśuśrūṣitāṃ gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ  #
analyzed: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇa vaineyaḥ dhātu vaineyaḥ ka śāyika jātīyaḥ tathāgate aśraddadhāna tām a guru śuśrūṣi tām gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ

original: parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati na cākrāntirna saṃkrāntistathāgatānāṃ saṃvidyate | ]
analyzed: parinirvāṇam darśayati na ca ākrāntiḥ na saṃkrāntiḥ tathāgatānām saṃvidyate
sarva sattvāḥ paripakva kuśala mūlāḥ bhavanti
tathāgate darśana abhikāṃkṣiṇaḥ pūjā arhāḥ dharma śravaṇa āthikāḥ

original: candramaṇḍalaṃ [yathā rocate tathā] tadā tathāgatā loka utpadyante bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya |
analyzed: candra maṇḍalam yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatāḥ loke utpadyante bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya

original: yāvaddevānāṃ ca munuṣyānāṃ ca triratnoddyota[nāya sphuṭanāya na] ca tathāgatānāṃ jātiḥ saṃvidyate |
analyzed: yāvat devānām ca munuṣyānām ca tri ratna uddyotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānām jātiḥ saṃvidyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ ādarśamaṇḍale sumṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante [dṛśyaṃ na saṃvidyate na] tatrāgamo dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya  #
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kula putrāḥ ādarśa maṇḍale su mṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyam na saṃvidyate na tatra āgamaḥ dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya  /
evam eva deva putrāḥ tathāgata kāyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma kula[putrā māyakāraḥsu]śikṣitaḥ nānānagaratoraṇodyānāṃ nānārathāṃ cakravartirūpāṃ nānāratikrīḍāṃ darśayitvā antardhāpayati  #
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kula putrāḥ māyakāraḥ su śikṣitaḥ nānā nagara toraṇa udyānām nānā rathām cakravarti rūpām nānā rati krīḍām darśayitvā antardhāpayati  /

original: na ca tasyāḥ krāntirdṛśyate [na] āgamo na nirgamaḥ evameva tathāgatānāmutapādaparinirvāṇaṃ draṣṭavyam |
analyzed: na ca tasyāḥ krāntiḥ dṛśyate na āgamaḥ na nirgamaḥ evam eva tathāgatānām utapāda parinirvāṇam draṣṭavyam

original: api ca devaputrāḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā api kalpaparinirvṛtā api kalpakoṭi parinīrvṛtā api sattvānāṃ pūjanasatkaraṇadhātustūpakārāpaṇaprati[bimbakārāpaṇa]–nāmadheyagrahaṇasaddharmadhāraṇapūjanā  #
analyzed: api ca deva putrāḥ pūrva praṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtāḥ api kalpa parinirvṛtāḥ api kalpa koṭi parinīrvṛtāḥ api sattvānām pūjana satkaraṇa dhātu stūpa kārāpaṇa pratibimba kārāpaṇa nāmadheya grahaṇa saddharma dhāraṇa pūjanā

original: nānālokadhātuvyavasthitā api mokṣayanti sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokā[kṣaṇa]durgativinipātebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ yāvadanupūrveṇa anuttarāṃ  #
analyzed: nānā lokadhātu vyavasthitāḥ api mokṣayanti sarva naraka tiryagyoni yama loka akṣaṇa durgati vinipātebhyaḥ sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ yāvat anupūrveṇa anuttarām
samyaksaṃbodhi sambhisaṃbudhyate

original: kaḥ punarvādo ye tathāgata[ān pratyakṣa]pūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandhapuṣpamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇaiḥ |
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ ye tathāgata ān pratyakṣa pūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandha puṣpa mālya vilepana vastra ābharaṇaiḥ

original: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecit sattvā varṣaśatasahastrakalpakoṭīparinirvṛtān [prāñjalibhūtān eka]vārān nāmadheyaṃ grahīṣyanti 'namo buddhāyeti' kṛtvā  #
analyzed: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecid sattvāḥ varṣa śata sahastra kalpa koṭī parinirvṛtān prāñjali bhūtān eka vārāt nāmadheyam grahīṣyanti namaḥ buddhāya iti kṛtvā

original: puṣpamākāśe kṣepsyanti te sarve duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti |
analyzed: puṣpam ākāśe kṣepsyanti te sarve duḥkhasya antam kariṣyanti

original: tiṣṭhatvākāśe puṣpaṃ ye kecit [sattvāḥ] anuśikṣamāṇāstathāgatapūjārthāya ekatathāgataśikṣāmapi dhārayiṣyanti ekadivasam ekarātrimuhūrtaṃ tathāgata[pūjanacintā–]bhiyuktāḥ  #
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ākāśe puṣpam ye kecid sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāḥ tathāgata pūjā arthāya eka tathāgata śikṣām api dhārayiṣyanti eka divasam eka rātri muhūrtam tathāgata pūjana cintā abhiyuktāḥ  /
sarva duḥkhasya antam kṛtvā nupūrveṇa anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhiṣyanti
